meanings.definition: Amagon is the name of a video game released for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES).
meanings.english_definition: Amagon is the title of a video game released for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES).

examples.sentence: The main character of Amagon can transform into a powerful giant.
examples.translation: アマゴンの主人公は強力な巨人に変身することができます。

etymology.value: The etymology of the name 'Amagon' is not definitively known, but it may be a portmanteau or a made-up word for the game.

usage_notes.explanation: 'Amagon' is primarily used as a proper noun to refer specifically to the NES game of the same name.

readability_explanation.text: This entry describes a specific video game title, so readability is not directly applicable.
